name: Fire Fight (itch)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 33 in 72 hours

Intro

One day after work you come home to find your house on fire and your wife dead. You decide to take your anger out on the city Fire Service, gathering fire crystals and transforming into an angry red monster.

There is an intro, a main level and a boss level.

Controls

WASD to move
Left Ctrl to shoot fireball
Left and right arrow keys to punch

Created by:

- Paul Jones (Programming) - Paul's Twitter

- Logan Krippner (Programming)

- Craig Barnes (Music) - Craig's Twitter

- Shawn Yang (Art)

Post Mortem is here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/2015/08/25/fire-fight-ludum-dare-33-post-mortem/
